thread.title: Watch: Sean Spicer Lights Press Briefing ON FIRE When Reporter Tries Shaming Him on “Muslim Ban”
thread.title_full: Watch: Sean Spicer Lights Press Briefing ON FIRE When Reporter Tries Shaming Him on “Muslim Ban”

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Watch: Sean Spicer Lights Press Briefing ON FIRE When Reporter Tries Shaming Him on “Muslim Ban”
text:
06:26pm   
Sean Spicer might have struggled a little bit out of the gate as Trump’s press secretary but over the last week or so he has been absolutely crushing it. 
The mainstream media have been unhappy with his performance which means he’s doing a great job. 
If he is ruffling media feathers then he’s doing what he should be. 
Here’s the latest example of Spicer handling business when an MSNBC reporter asked him about Trump’s immigration order. 

  
“The president himself has called it a ban,” Welker asked. “Are you confused or is he confused?” 
“Those are the media’s words,” Spicer said. “No, I’m not confused. Those words are derived from the media. Your network was one of the ones that just hours ago said [Homeland Security Secretary] Kelly didn’t know what was going on. With all due respect, I think you have been part of the confusion.” 
Nailed it. 
Here’s the video… WATCH: White House: Pres. Trump is using the word "ban" because the media is using the word "ban. @kwelkernbc : "Those are his words." pic.twitter.com/hu10yUB9Q5 
— NBC Nightly News (@NBCNightlyNews) January 31, 2017 
The media knows this is not a “Muslim ban”. 
They know it’s a temporary travel ban. 
They are purposely misleading the public to think otherwise. 
It’s simply embarrassing. LIKE this article? I hated this article. I'm a liberal.
